definitions: inability to move easily and without pain

examples.text: stretching exercises ease stiffness in the legs

definitions: the quality of being firm and difficult to bend or move

examples.text: the stiffness of a boot affects the mobility of the foot

examples.text: one flaw is the scholarly stiffness of the academics
